description: This file contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for the Note API in a notes application. It includes request classes for creating and updating notes, and a response class for representing note details.

classes.name: NoteDtos.CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new note with title and content, including validation annotations.

classes.name: NoteDtos.UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing note; title is optional but has size constraints, content is optional.

classes.name: NoteDtos.NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the note data returned in responses, including metadata such as timestamps.

methods.name: NoteResponse
methods.description: Constructor for initializing NoteResponse instances with note details.
